ارجنٹائن نے 1990 میں فائنل میں جگہ بنائی: Argentina 1990 World Cup final Did Argentina reach the 1990 World Cup final?
Argentina 1990 World Cup final Did Argentina reach the 1990 World Cup final?

In 1990, West Germany claimed its third FIFA World Cup title by defeating Argentina in a tightly contested final that ended 1-0. This match, held at the Stadio Olímpico in Rome, was marked by controversy, particularly regarding officiating decisions that impacted both teams.
